title: A Friend Called Anne: One girl's story of War, Peace and a unique friendship withAnne Frank
description: As a resident of Amsterdam who was lucky enough to be deported and not sent to concentration camps like other families, Jopie, a close friend of Anne Frank, provides stories of their friendship while recollecting what life was like during that difficult period in time as, one by one, friends and neighbors were gathered up and sent away.
author: Jacqueline van Maarsen
